SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.geometry

Interface Model

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
public interface Model extends Serializable
Represents a graphical model of an object in 3D space. Models are shallowly immutable, and thus faces cannot be added or removed after instantiation.
See Also:
